header.title: Tommy Robinson believes ‘working class will be electrified’ if he joins Ukip
header.postText: Tommy Robinson believes the ‘British working class will be electrified’ if he is allowed to join Ukip.', 'The party’s National Executive Committee met today and allowed members to debate at September’s conference on whether to allow the far-right activist to join Ukip.', 'Yesterday, Robinson begged the NEC to allow him to join Ukip despite previously calling the party ‘the establishment’.', 'Robinson, real name Stephen Yaxley-Lennon, spoke in the third person repeatedly in his first video since being released from prison after being jailed for contempt of court.', 'He said: ‘I want to join Ukip. The British working class will be electrified if I join Ukip. The left wing media is terrified about me joining Ukip.', '‘I want to say thank you to Gerard Batten and Ukip for reaching out to me. Gerard is the only politician that could get me up and out to vote.’', 'Robinson also praised Nigel Farage, who banned EDL members from joining Ukip when he was leader, for delivering Brexit.', 'The Ukip statement said: ‘After due consideration on consulting the Ukip National Executive Committee, the party chairman has decided to allow a debate at the party conference on the membership of Tommy Robinson.', '‘The particular motion requests that the NEC lifts the ban on proscribed groups in his case only.’
header.socioLingVar: Ethnicity - General,Gender - General,Age - Youngsters,Nationality - General,Physical Identity - Physical (and Mental) Impairments,Nationality - Irish,Religious Identity - Roman Catholic,Religious Identity - Muslim, Ideological and Political Identity - General,Nationality - European or anti-Europeans
